Reviews.Title: Handy Canon Power Shot A4000
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: For such a compact camera, this unit does an amazing job of getting the best shots. The user has many options or the camera can be used as "point and shoot".  I really do enjoy using it and looking forward to heavy use.  I have a Canon A-1 camera, a Sony do anything digital camera and now this Canon Power Shot that fits in a pocket and is always ready for that just one great shot.  I'd recommend it to anyone.

ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot A4000 IS 16 Megapixel Compact Camera - Silver
